name: Dimgeer - The Colors
description:
A lo-fi, slow walking simulator.

All doors can be entered.
All lifts and stairs can be used.
All inhabitants in-game are in-game.


PRESS UP to use elevators and enter doors.

Originally started as a Bitsy project but grew in scope.

============

Changelog 1.0b
============

• Added logo in starting cave
• Moved the deity
• Added readme.txt to zip file
• Changed apartment layouts to not interfere with inhabitants' fear of wolves
• Everything is pan now
• Youareweallwhyall
